DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the pulsatility index changes after setting supine position in non brain- injured patient under general anesthesia.
DOC.brief_title: Study of the Effect of the Supine Position at Brain Velocities in Noncerebro - Injured Patient
DOC.criteria: minimum 18 years old, maximum 45 years old for men and 55 years old for women. surgery with supine position. refusal to participate failure of measurement brain velocity Penthotal or de k√©tamine before measurment Cardiac or pulmonary desease
